channel.title: Reading on 楚大洋

item.title: Uhuru's Big 4 Agenda In Chinese
item.description: The Big 4 Agenda identifies Four Priority initiatives to be implemented over the next five years 2017 – 2022, core among them the Delivery of 500,000 Affordable Housing Units. 经济适用房, 制造企业, 食品安全, 全民医疗保健
